regions.name: The Embrace
regions.description: The Embrace, sometimes called All-Mother's Embrace, is a small valley region in the southwestern part of the Nora Sacred Lands in Horizon Zero Dawn.

regions.name: Burning Shores
regions.description: The Burning Shores are the playable location of Horizon Forbidden West: Burning Shores. The Burning Shores were mentioned in datapoints in Horizon Forbidden West.
